definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: Most of us can’t tell our secant from our cotangent.
sentences.chinese: 我们中的大多数不能分辨正切余切。

sentences.english: Another is to intenerate the input vectors by hyperbola tangent function.
sentences.chinese: 二是采用双曲线正切函数柔化输入矢量。

sentences.english: Y is tangential to the ground at the device's current location and points toward the geomagnetic North Pole.
sentences.chinese: 值是设备当前所处位置与地磁北极的正切值。

sentences.english: The sidelong edge is an important composition part of the rotary blade.
sentences.chinese: 正切刃是旋耕刀的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Conspicuous is the nearly complete absence of tangential forms in nature.
sentences.chinese: 特别是那种正切的造型在自然界中几乎不存在。

sentences.english: The charge, exploded, and the knife, in springing back, closed into its owners wrist.
sentences.chinese: 枪响了，那把刀弹回去，正切着枪主的手腕。

sentences.english: The charge,exploded, and the knife, in springing back, closed into its owners wrist.
sentences.chinese: 枪响了，那把刀弹回去，正切着枪主的手腕。

sentences.english: Returns the hyperbolic tangent of the specified angle.
sentences.chinese: 返回指定角度的双曲正切值。

sentences.english: Store normals in generic space, e. g. , tangent space.
sentences.chinese: 存储非普通空间的法向量，例如，正切空间。

definition: cotangent (of angle), written cot θ or ctg θ
cosecant (of angle), written cosec θ or csc θ
complementary angle (additional angle adding to 90 degrees)
chord angle (i.e. angle a chord of a curve makes to the tangent)
